dct_title_s: L'AMERICA Descritta conforme lo stato presente et accresciuta di varie notizie
dct_description_sm: California as an island on Briggs model.
Includes three tables: Divsione Generale Dell America, America Settentrionale, and America Meridionale.
Insets: Terre Artiche verso L'America, Isole del mar del sud tra le coste del Peru d della Carpentaria, and Terra del Fuoco.
Issued in: Tabulæ geographicæ, quibus universa geographia vetus continetur, Seminario Vescovile, Padua, 1699-[1702].
da G. Batta Canali [Giovanni Battista Canali].
Tooley's Catalog Number One/ R.V. Tooley Limited, London, 1979; Sotheby's, Atlases, travel and natural history, Thursday, 13th April 1989, Item#197.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
